title: Profiles of Hope
description: Ten men. Ten Stories. Ten Profiles.In "Profiles of Hope", psychologist, Dr. Gary Swanson, puts together a unique social experiment. He, and nine additional men tell exciting, thrilling, compassionate, and enthralling stories.Each man is represented by a color, which corresponds to his separate profile.Every man has a unique story, which you will be amazed by. These men share their stories, in a project called, "Profiles of Hope"
author: Brennen Tammons
